dialogue.text: Me? Right, I guess some people might be tuning in for the first time today. I'd be more than happy to give you a little intro on myself.
My name is Sun-Dried! Though you can call me Sunny, SunSun, SD, or whatever you'd like. I love cute nicknames.
Let's see... I'm 19 years old. I love music, technology, and all things cute and fluffy!
My favorite color is orange. My favorite animals are bunnies. My favorite song is TIMESHOCK! by Sour and Sweet.
Hmm... I'm not sure what else to say, eheh.
C'mon, Sunny. The little personal details are nice and all, but you gotta tell everyone about all the cool things you've done!
I guess so. I don't like bragging about that kind of stuff.
Then I'll do the bragging for you!
Sunny here was president of the Enzync Academy Robotics Club! She helped the school win more awards than my internal memory can count!
Plus, y'know... you helped build me! That's one of the coolest things a person could ever do! 100% unbiased, heh heh.
And don't forget that blog you run! Everything about it is just so well put together!
Eheh, I do take pride in that blog. Had to put my HTML knowledge to the test to make it that pretty. I'm a sucker for those old school aesthetics.
Oh, oh! I forgot to mention that she's also an upcoming musician herself. The stuff she's been cooking up has been absolutely stellar.
That's... more just a little side experiment thing-
Well, you gotta share with everyone one day, Sunny!
Maybe... I don't know. All my stuff doesn't sound finished yet...
